subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: The author saw Sugar Ray Robinson, talked to Jack Dempsey, survived a brawl after a controversial decision, and covered iconic fights involving Muhammad Ali, Joe Frazier and Mike Tyson.
snippet: The author saw Sugar Ray Robinson, talked to Jack Dempsey, survived a brawl after a controversial decision, and covered iconic fights involving Muhammad Ali, Joe Frazier and Mike Tyson.
